description:
Title:

Creative Brand Partnerships Manager for International Influencer

Description:

We are seeking a dynamic and innovative individual to join our team as a Creative Brand Partnerships Manager. As an international influencer, I am looking for someone who can think outside the box, maintain a friendly attitude, and communicate honestly. Your primary role will be to secure exclusive brand deals with quality brands for paid collaborations while navigating the complexities of influencer marketing.

Responsibilities:

- Identify and secure a minimum of 2 big brand deals per month for paid collaborations.

- Source exclusive brand deals with quality brands suitable for an international influencer.

- Communicate promptly and effectively with brands, negotiating terms and agreements.

- Each brand deals from start to finish (research, approach, communication, negotiation, payment, etc)

- Assist with creative strategy development to ensure successful collaborations.

- Provide ongoing support and guidance throughout the partnership process.

- Utilize tools like Notion and AI platforms for efficient organization and research.

- Utilize Instagram, TikTok, Gmail, Video Editing tools and marketing tools for outreach and communication.

- Demonstrate tech-savviness and adaptability to new tools and platforms.

- Understand and accommodate the needs of ADHD, with a psychology background being a plus.

- Being able to find brand deals with great international, EU and US companies without being in the US, since many deals are for US based influencers, you need to find ways around it, Im in Europe.

Requirements:

- Minimum of 2 years of experience in influencer marketing or a related field.

- Proven track record of successfully securing brand deals for influencers.

- Ability to work in Europe time zone and maintain a long-term commitment.

- Willingness to undergo a one-week trial period before formal engagement.

- Native English speakers or Fluent English only, Russian language is a plus.

Commission-based compensation with the potential for a fixed salary once stable earnings are achieved. Payment will be made only after each deal is completed and brand has paid.

Note: This is not a paid upfront or fixed salary opportunity. Compensation will be provided only after successfull deals, with the percentage increasing based on the size of the deal.

If you are passionate about influencer marketing and possess the skills and attitude we're looking for, we would love to hear from you! Please include examples of your previous successes and any relevant experience in your application.

Working with me as an influencer is unique due to my diverse background as an artist, designer, makeup artist, and tech enthusiast, Im open for any discussions and ideas!

PS,

Other skills like editing videos in capcut or similar that will help my content making or strategy game stronger is a plus, the % will be increased ofc ;)

Im a big influencer, my content is quality, and my engagement rate is good, this will affect the size of the brands you reach out to ;)

Being an art and fashion lover with a modern approach to life is a plus ;)

Comission will be within 10 and 20% range that might increase over time depending on your perfomance ;)

See my mediakit attached:

https://drive.google.com/file/d/1AL1rjProSBH3KzloXTfVYY774MtGzvvf/view

Write code word "purple" in your cover letter to increase your chances!
